basics.name: Saeed Khatami
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the Iran Azad University. I expect to graduate in 2026.

work.summary: Interned as a Backend Developer, gaining valuable experience and knowledge in software development.
highlights: Acquired knowledge on Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) and their integration with frontend and backend systems.
Gained proficiency in crafting APIs using Java in conjunction with the Spring Boot framework.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve backend issues, enhancing product stability.
Assisted in database design and optimization, improving system performance and scalability.

work.summary: Experienced DevOps professional skilled in CI/CD, cloud technologies, and automation.
highlights: Spearheaded the implementation of CI/CD pipelines
Implemented robust monitoring and alerting systems
Led efforts to migrate on-premises infrastructure to the cloud
Automated repetitive tasks using scripting languages such as Python and Bash
Orchestrated containerization using Docker for efficient deployment and scaling of applications.
Implemented Kubernetes for container orchestration, enabling seamless management of containerized workloads.
Collaborated cross-functionally with development and operations teams to optimize workflows and foster a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement.

work.summary: Skilled Game Developer with expertise in level design and gameplay programming, contributing to the success of Morbid Mind Game Studio.
highlights: Designed and developed engaging game levels, focusing on immersive player experiences.
Implemented gameplay mechanics and features, enhancing overall gameplay dynamics and enjoyment.
Collaborated with team members to brainstorm and execute creative game concepts.
Conducted playtesting and iteration cycles to refine game mechanics and optimize player engagement.
Proficient in game development engines such as Unreal Engine, Unity Engine, and Godot Engine.
